Miscellaneous Highlights: India will now shift their focus to the West Indies for the Super Eight phase.
All three of India's Super Eight games will be held in the Caribbean.
Indian cricket fans can catch all the action live on the Star Sports Network, while the live streaming will be available on Disney+ Hotstar
Others: The eight qualified teams will be split into two groups of four each.
Each team will play three fixtures in this phase, with the top two from each group securing their spots in the semifinals.
